name: surface_radioactivity_content_of_232U
description: The surface called "surface" means the lower boundary of the atmosphere. "Content" indicates a quantity per unit area. "Radioactivity" means the number of radioactive decays of a material per second. "U" means the element "uranium" and "232U" is the isotope "uranium-232" with a half-life of 2.63e+04 days.
